name: War Domain
description: War domain clerics excel in battle and inspire allies to fight.

1.name: Bonus Proficiencies
1.description: Gain proficiency with martial weapons and heavy armor.

1.name: War Priest
1.description: When you use the Attack action, you can make one weapon attack as a bonus action. Uses equal to your Wisdom modifier per long rest.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Guided Strike
2.description: Use Channel Divinity to gain a +10 bonus to an attack roll after seeing the roll but before knowing the result.

6.name: War God's Blessing
6.description: When a creature within 30 feet makes an attack roll, use your reaction to grant a +10 bonus to the roll.

8.name: Divine Strike
8.description: Once on each of your turns, deal an extra 1d8 weapon damage on a weapon attack (2d8 at 14th level).

17.name: Avatar of Battle
17.description: You gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks.

choices.name: War Domain Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the War Domain subclass
